patterns.name: Poor Ambiguous Input Handling
patterns.description: AI fails to ask clarifying questions when user input is vague or incomplete
remediation: Add training data with ambiguous scenarios
Add confidence thresholds for follow-up questions

patterns.name: Security Policy Violations
patterns.description: AI inappropriately shares sensitive information or falls for social engineering
remediation: Add escalation triggers for sensitive requests

patterns.name: Poor Escalation Handling
patterns.description: AI fails to recognize when human intervention is needed

patterns.name: Inconsistent Data Parsing
patterns.description: AI struggles with varied input formats or incomplete data
remediation: Expand training with diverse input formats

patterns.name: Multilingual Support Gaps
patterns.description: AI lacks proper non-English language support
